title: Nissan-Renault firms up plans to launch half a dozen SUVs in India
description: First off the block, will be SUV X-Trail, which will be imported as a completely built units (CBU). Two more mid-size SUVs - a five-seater and a seven-seater - will follow soon after to take on the likes of Hyundai Creta, Maruti Suzuki Grand Vitara and Toyota Hyryder. India would be the sole production hub for half of these five models planned for launch by 2026, which also includes an affordable EV.
